channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- LinkWorth Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- LinkWorth Plugin

item.title: CVE-2022-2172|2024-08-03T00:32:08.540Z -- unknown -- linkworth%20plugin
item.description: The LinkWorth WordPress plugin before 3.3.4 does not implement nonce checks, which could allow attackers to make a logged in admin change settings via a CSRF attack.
